name: Khamsin (AdiBaron)
description:
Khamsin

~~~

Khamsin is a thrilling game about a shepherd who must guide his flock through the treacherous desert in search of water. In the scorching heat of the Khamsin winds, the journey is full of danger and obstacles that threaten the lives of the shepherd and his flock.

As the shepherd, your mission is to lead your flock through the desert, keep a watchful eye on the flock avoiding obstacles such as cacti, and rocks. 

~~~

Can you lead your flock to the source of water before the nightfall? Play Khamsin now and find out!
